name: Horizon Photographer
description:
Horizon Photographer (beta) is a 60-second photography game inspired by a Tom Eckersley's poster. The player can take any pictures (12 at most) they like including the one same as the original poster. Full-screen is recommended.

  • Left Click - Take a picture
  • Right Click - Switch the portrait mode
  • Mouse Wheel - Scale the camera frame

Credits: Designer · Programmer · Artist - Jiahui (Tino) Hu; Music by - Pacific Moon (The Sound of the Sea); Supervised by - Daivd King, LCC MA Games Design 19-20.
